summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates core Django model and queryset functionality, including object creation, relational fields, deletion behavior, handling of empty querysets, equality and hashing semantics, primary key specifications, microsecond precision support, operator behavior, class‑level attribute access, bulk deletions, Unicode handling, and specific edge‑case scenarios.
business_intent: Provide automated verification to ensure the ORM layer behaves as expected across a wide range of operations, preventing regressions and guaranteeing data integrity in production applications.
